<< mag2db Signal Processing sinc >>

pow2db

Convert power to decibel.

Syntax

db = pow2db(pow)

Input argument

pow

input array: scalar, vector or matrix.

Output argument

db

corresponding values in decibels

Description

db = pow2db(pow) returns corresponding values in decibels.

Example

DB = pow2db([1, 0.01])

See also

db2pow.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
